content.text: Match ends, Hércules 1, Valencia 2.
Second Half ends, Hércules 1, Valencia 2.
Offside, Valencia. Alejandro Domínguez tries a through ball, but Joaquín is caught offside.
Jeremy Mathieu (Valencia) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Jeremy Mathieu (Valencia).
Royston Drenthe (Hércules) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Corner,  Hércules. Conceded by Manuel Fernandes.
Tote (Hércules) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Alejandro Domínguez (Valencia).
Corner,  Hércules. Conceded by César.
Attempt saved. Kiko Femenía (Hércules) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Tote.

Alejandro Domínguez (Valencia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Royston Drenthe (Hércules) is shown the yellow card.
David Trezeguet (Hércules) hits the left post with a header from very close range. Assisted by Tote.
